docs.title: Columns/Slots/Fields
docs.text: Slot Description aggregator_knowledge_source Aggregators of the knowledge all_categories All categories associated with the entity anatomical Tag to denote this disease to be part of a grouping according to the anatomic... attribute_type The type of attribute category Biolink category of the entity category_class The disase identifier crossreferences Cross-references to other databases and ontologies curation_type The type of curation (manual / automatic) definition The definition of the disease description Detailed description of the entity entries A list property for collections of things equivalent_identifiers List of equivalent identifiers for the entity harrisons_view Tag to denote this disease to be part of a grouping according to the Harrison... id A unique identifier for a thing international_resource_identifier IRI of the entity is_acquired Flag to denote this disease corresponds to an acquired form of a disease is_andor Flag to denote this disease corresponds to a disease that is a combination of... is_cancer Flag to denote if this disease corresponds to a cancer type is_clingen Flag to denote that this disease term is used directly by https://clinicalgen... is_glucose_dysfunction Flag to denote if this disease corresponds to a glucose dysfunction is_grouping_subset Flag to denote this disease is manually curated to be a grouping term is_grouping_subset_ancestor Flag to denote this disease is a parent of a disease that was manually curate... is_icd_billable Flag to denote this disease was corresponds to an ICD code that is billable is_icd_category Flag to denote this disease was corresponds to an ICD category is_icd_chapter_code Flag to denote this disease was corresponds to an ICD chapter code is_icd_chapter_header Flag to denote this disease was corresponds to an ICD chapter header is_leaf Flag to denote this disease is a leaf node in the disease hierarchy is_leaf_direct_parent Flag to denote this disease is a direct parent of a leaf node in the disease ... is_matrix_manually_excluded Flag to denote this disease was manually excluded from the disease list by a ... is_matrix_manually_included Flag to denote this disease was manually included from the disease list by a ... is_mondo_subtype Flag to denote this disease was identified to be a subtype through lexical ma... is_obsoletion_candidate Flag to denote that this disease is marked for obsoletion in the (near) futur... is_omim Flag to denote this disease is manually curated to be a disease according to ... is_omimps Flag to denote this disease is manually curated to be a phenotypic series acc... is_omimps_descendant Flag to denote this disease is a child/descendant of a disease that is manual... is_orphanet_disorder Flag to denote this disease is manually curated to be a disease according to ... is_orphanet_subtype Flag to denote this disease is manually curated to be a disease subtype accor... is_orphanet_subtype_descendant Flag to denote this disease is a child/descendant of a disease that is manual... is_paraphilic Flag to denote this disease corresponds to a paraphilic disorder rather than ... is_pathogen_caused Flag to denote if this disease is caused by a pathogen is_pathway_defect Flag to denote this disease corresponds to a pathway defect rather than a pro... is_susceptibility Flag to denote this disease corresponds to a susceptibility rather than a pro... is_unclassified_hereditary Flag to denote that this disease has no descendants (is a leaf) and  is class... is_withorwithout Flag to denote this disease corresponds to a disease that can be present with... knowledge_level Knowledge level of the relationship label The name of the disease labels Alternative labels for the entity medical_specialization Tag this disease with a medical specialisation mondo_top_grouping Tag to denote this disease to be a mondo_txgnn Tag to denote this disease to be part of a grouping as defined by the txgnn p... name Human-readable name of the entity object The object entity in the edge object_aspect_qualifier Aspect qualifier for the object object_direction_qualifier Direction qualifier for the object official_matrix_filter Flag to denote this disease corresponds to a disease that can be treated with... other_subsets_count The number of other subtypes in the subset this disease belongs to predicate The predicate defining the relationship primary_knowledge_source Primary source of the knowledge in the edge publications Publications associated with the entity subject The subject entity in the edge subject_aspect_qualifier Aspect qualifier for the subject subject_direction_qualifier Direction qualifier for the subject subset_group_id The identifier of a disease representing the subtype series this disease belo... subset_group_label The name (label) of a disease representing the subtype series this disease be... subsets The subsets of the disease in which it is part synonyms Any exact synonyms of the disease tag_existing_treatment Flag to denote if this disease has some existing treatment tag_qaly_lost Tag denoting the degree to which Quality-Adjusted Life Year (QALY) lost txgnn Tag this disease to be part of a grouping as defined by the txgnn paper upstream_data_source Sources from which this entity's data originates

docs.title: Classes
docs.text: Class Description DiseaseListEntry A disease entry in the disease list. MatrixDiseaseList A list of diseases. MatrixEdge An edge representing a relationship between two nodes in the Biolink knowledge graph. MatrixEdgeCollection A holder for MatrixEdge objects. MatrixNode A node in the Biolink knowledge graph. MatrixNodeCollection A holder for MatrixNode objects.

docs.title: Enumerations
docs.text: Enumeration Description AttributeTypeEnum Code used to describe the nature of a slot, for documentative purposes CurationTypeEnum Code used to describe how a slot / attribute was curated

docs.title: Types
docs.text: Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer Jsonpath A string encoding a JSON Path Jsonpointer A string encoding a JSON Pointer Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model Sparqlpath A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE

docs.text:
URI: matrix_schema:harrisons_view

Applicable to: DiseaseListEntry !!! info "Description"

_Tag to denote this disease to be part of a grouping according to the Harrison's textbook. Top-level classes in Mondo are manually curated by the Mondo team to "belong" to a Harrison's textbook chapter. Disagreements should be reported on the Mondo issue tracker (https://github.com/monarch-initiative/mondo/issues)._

docs.title: is_icd_chapter_header
docs.text:
URI: matrix_schema:is_icd_chapter_header

Applicable to: DiseaseListEntry !!! info "Description"

_Flag to denote this disease was corresponds to an ICD chapter header. Chapter headers (or chapter titles), for example A00 (Cholera) can be identified by codes without dashes or periods and are usually the top-level categories within each chapter. Most of the time, these are not proper diseases, but groupings of diseases._

_Flag to denote this disease is manually curated to be a disease according to OMIM (https://www.omim.org/),  one of the most important genetic disease authorities in the world.  A disease according to OMIM usually corresponds to a proper disease entity or a subtype, not a disease grouping._

docs.title: official_matrix_filter
docs.text:
URI: matrix_schema:official_matrix_filter

Applicable to: DiseaseListEntry !!! info "Description"

_Flag to denote this disease corresponds to a disease that can be treated with small molecules or biologics. This flag is maintained as a combination of default filters by the Matrix team. Changes to this filter should be discussed on the Matrix disease list issue tracker (https://github.com/everycure-org/matrix-disease-list/issues). **Warning**. This flag is in early alpha state, and its use in production systems is not recommended._
__
